name: Aiiria
description: Aiiria is an innovative UK technology company aiming to simplify the adoption of cloud technology from start-up scale to large public sector organisations in the UK, Europe and Internationally. Our primary focus is to enable our clients to simplify and streamline the adoption of cloud services, through innovation & thought-leadership. We are a passionate organisation whose goal is to improve end-user experience.

locations.address: First Floor, Swan House, 37 - 39 High Holborn
